plist511_test.comment: Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='AutomaticCheckEnabled']/following-sibling::*[1]/number() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.SoftwareUpdate.plist operation equals datatype int and value 1

Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='wvous-tl-corner']/following-sibling::*[1]/text() in $HOME/Library/Preferences/com.apple.dock operation not equal datatype int and value 6

Ensure /plist/dict/key/following-sibling::*[1]/key[text()='Enabled']/following-sibling::*[1]/text() in /Library/Preferences/SystemConfiguration/com.apple.nat.plist operation equals datatype int and value 0

Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='globalstate']/following-sibling::*[1]/text() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.alf.plist operation less than or equal datatype int and value 2
Ensure firewall stealth mode is enabled

Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='SecureKeyboardEntry']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in $HOME/Library/Preferences/com.apple.Terminal operation equals datatype boolean and value true
Ensure Firewall logging is enabled

Ensure /plist/dict/key[.='menuExtras']/following-sibling::*[1]/string[.='/System/Library/CoreServices/Menu Extras/AirPort.menu']/text() in $HOME/Library/Preferences/com.apple.systemuiserver.plist operation equals datatype string and value /System/Library/
Ensure password is required when waking from sleep
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='LoginwindowText']/following-sibling::*[1] in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.loginwindow.plist operation pattern match datatype string and value ^.+$
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='MultipleSessionEnabled']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /Library/Preferences/.GlobalPreferences.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value false
